about_the_game:
Hop Step Sing! Summer Live 2023 is a real-time VR live performance by VR idols Hop Step Sing! held worldwide on November 23, 2023 in Japanese, English, and Chinese.

In this third live performance, the girls act as saviors and fight together with the villagers against the demon king who rules the cursed village. Players will take part in the battle as the heroes of the adventure, along with other players, to fulfill the mission of liberating the village. The live performance of the VR idols Hop Step Sing!

Synopsis:  

Summer Live 2023 takes place in the VR world of Kita Sinagawa, a village full of freedom, excitement and possibilities thanks to VR, when suddenly one day a curse from the 'Demon King' robbed it of its smiles. Some of the villagers who escaped the curse seek help from the HSS Circus, who made people smile with their singing and dancing. The three circus performers and the villagers embark on a singing and dancing adventure to bring smiles back to Kita Sinagawa. Will their power of singing and dancing be able to defeat the Demon King?

Singer:

  • Niina Hop Nijikawa (CV: Maria Sashide)

  • Shikiri Step Shiishiba  (CV: Toribe Mariko)

  • Mikasa Sing Minowa (CV: Natsumi Hioka)

  • Demon King(CV: Yamaguchi Kappei)

【About Hop Step Sing!】

Hop Step Sing! is a coming of age success saga about three young girls who leverage VR technology to ascend the ranks of the idol world. Since their debut in 2017, they have made waves across multiple platforms, including six VR music videos, the Nico Nico Live Stream show Hop Nama and a comic series.

Since 2017, they have been active in various media such as distribution of VR Music videos, the Nico Live program Hop Nama, comic serialization, etc. In 2020, they held VR Live Hop☆Summer for the whole world and over 20,000 fans enjoyed the live performance. VR Live Hop☆Summer has since been held three times from 2022 to 2024, and the idol group is working hard to become the top idol in the world.
